channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tesla’s stock could climb by more than 25% as robotaxi efforts intensify, analyst says
item.description: The bulk of Stifel’s new Tesla price target is predicated on the company’s Full Self-Driving and robotaxi technologies.

item.title: Stocks, bonds — pretty much everything is overvalued, ‘bond king’ says
item.description: Jeffrey Gundlach says investors need to shake up their traditional portfolio due to a swath of overpriced assets, such as stocks.

item.title: ‘I still have horrible memories of the Bernie Madoff scandal’: I’m 63. Who can I trust with my $655K retirement fund?
One of Warren Buffett’s last moves as Berkshire CEO was to buy this ‘Magnificent Seven’ tech stock
item.description: Berkshire Hathaway has disclosed a stake in Google parent Alphabet that’s now worth about $5 billion.

item.title: Morgan Stanley hikes S&P 500 target for next year. Here are the plays to make.
item.description: Earnings growth and an accommodative Fed will support market multiples says Mike Wilson

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
